value.title: Age Calculation in Power BI using Power Query
value.excerpt: Power Query has a simple way of calculating the age. However, because DAX is the popular language in many calculations in Power BI, many are not aware of this function in Power Query. value.title: Aggregated Table in Power BI   Using GroupBy Function in DAX

You can also do it in DAX using some functions. One of the functions that can be used for grouping and aggregation is Group

value.title: Exception Reporting in Power BI Catch the Error Rows in Power Query
